description: Deletes a metadata table configuration from a general purpose bucket. For more information, see Accelerating data discovery with S3 Metadata in the Amazon S3 User Guide. To use this operation, you must have the s3:DeleteBucketMetadataTableConfiguration permission. For more information, see Setting up permissions for configuring metadata tables in the Amazon S3 User Guide. The following operations are related to DeleteBucketMetadataTableConfiguration:

parameters.name: Bucket
parameters.description: The general purpose bucket that you want to remove the metadata table configuration from.
